briefTitle: A Clinical Trial Targeting CEA Chimeric Antigen Receptor T (CAR-T) for CEA Positive Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors
officialTitle: Phase I Clinical Study of Chimeric Antigen Receptor T Cells (C-13-60) in the Treatment of Carcinoembryonic Antigen (CEA) Positive Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors
conditions: Colorectal Cancer, Esophagus Cancer, Gastric Cancer, Pancreas Cancer, Non-small Cell Lung Cancer, Breast Cancer, Bile Duct Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To determine the dose range and DLT of C-13-60 cells for CEA positive advanced malignant solid tumors [Safety and Tolerability]
